creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Council
description: Two clowns and a female personification of free thought crowned with laurels appear as powerless spectators of the tragic human comedy.
image_copyright: © Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
medium: Color lithograph in brown and blue ink
provenance: (Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York); sold to MIA, 1997.
signed: Signed and dated on the stone, lower left
title: Les Fous
